banner.text:
=> Meteor 1.0.2.1: Performance and stability improvements to the command-line
   tool, and a new server console command: 'meteor shell'.

   This release is being downloaded in the background. Update your app to
   Meteor 1.0.2 by running 'meteor update'.

=> Meteor 1.0.2.1: Fixes crash while watching source files for changes.

   This release is being downloaded in the background. Update your app to
   Meteor 1.0.2.1 by running 'meteor update'.
